text: Ola Lee Mize (August 28, 1931 - March 12, 2014) was a United States Army officer. He was a recipient of the Medal of Honor for his actions in the Korean War. He was born in Marshall County, Alabama. Mize died on March 12, 2014. He was 82 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== *Sergeant Ola L. Mize at the Alabama Department of Archives and History Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:Military people from Alabama Category:United States Army Medal of Honor recipients
title: Ola L. Mize
